amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the EPA Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund account by $7 million with offsets from the EPA Environmental Programs and Management account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to increase (by offset) the funds for "EPA-Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund" by $7.2 million.

action.text: Amendment (A022) offered by Mrs. Lois Capps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
